main.name: Luis Metzger
main.description: Team player software engineer with a can-do attitude, phenomenal time management skills, multi-level experience and a strong user focus.
main.bio: 4+ years of experience working in various technology companies. Have developed several web apps, including enterprise level B2B, health/fitness management. customer support and management software.
main.contactmessage: Would love to talk to you about any great opportunities:

resume.skillmessage: Here are just of few of my favorite skills and level of expertise:

education.degree: Immersive Web Development Bootcamp, General Assembly
education.description: Immersive study of full stack web development to master frontend dynamic design, back-end data management, and combine the two to create a seamless end user experience. applications.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description:
This position concentrated in professional services offered to high-end black diamond customers such as: Panera, Beam, SGWS, Danone, etc.
 Duties included the following: Building out custom functionality in Ruby/Rails based applications that are scaled for enterprise. Custom SQL reporting using: Postgres, Snowflake, and Looker. Work closely with QA teams in various environments.

work.title: Director of Technology & Engineering
work.description: This position directed a small technology department for the company to support our onsite health/fitness services and products. Help grop the platform from 600 to 20k+ users in less than 4 years.

work.title: Front-end Web Developer
work.description: Worked as a front-end developer for a small startup in Denver.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Marketing Department: Head of web development and digital presence for Sterling Healthcare Services and its divisions.

work.title: SEO & PPC Digital Marketer
work.description: As part of the operations team, I manage all aspects of the SEO strategy and implementation of that strategy to each one of our clientâ€™s websites.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
